Texts.Chs: 一颗^orange;血钻^reset;？棒极了。多亏了这些闪闪发光的石头，你可以在核聚变反应炉中制造一些^green;极为质优的金属^reset;了。
Texts.Eng: A ^orange;blood diamond^reset;? Excellent. Thanks to these sweet darlings, you're on your way to some ^green;really potent metals^reset; you can craft in your Fission Furnace!

Texts.Chs: 储量极大，易于寻找。^orange;硫矿石^reset;在许多方面有着重要的应用。它的主要用处是制作^green;肥料^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Abundant and simple to find, ^orange;sulphur^reset; is important for numerous applications. Its primary use is in ^green;fertilizers^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 强辐射性，^orange;铱矿石^reset;曾一度被认为是不可控的。但多亏了科技的发展，现在铱矿石可以转化为惰性。我建议你用它制作^green;反元素屏障^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Highly radioactive, ^orange;irradium^reset; was thought unharnessable at one point. But thanks to advancements it can be made inert to the user. I suggest using it as a ^green;barrier against the elements^reset;.
Much like lazulite, ^orange;mascagnite^reset; is readily available in most biomes and can be ^green;smelted or extracted^reset; at your leisure for different results.

Texts.Chs: ^green;比钨更硬^reset;的^orange;高熔点矿石^reset;。因其能够轻易的抵抗爆炸而广受推崇。
Texts.Eng: Slightly ^green;harder than tungsten^reset;, ^orange;Zerchesium^reset; is also revered for its ability to manipulate explosive force with ease.

Texts.Chs: 目前科学已知的，最为^green;致密及坚硬^reset;的天然矿石。因为^orange;重金属矿石^reset;是相当稀有的，所以它的市场售价不可思议的高。
Texts.Eng: The most ^green;dense and unbreakable^reset; naturally occurring ore that is currently known to science. ^orange;Densinium^reset; is quite rare, leading to an absurd market value.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;石墨烯^reset;有着惊人的保护能力。^green;单原子厚的石墨烯薄膜^reset;有着极好的传导能量的性质。同时也是一种不错的电容器。
Texts.Eng: The protective ability of ^orange;graphene^reset; is astounding. A ^green;single atom thick^reset;, it also conducts energy very well and acts as a capacitor.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;月形晶体^reset;散发着黄色的光。 而且经过加工能给予金属与塑料^green;奇异的特性^reset;。
Texts.Eng: This ^orange;lunari crystal^reset; shines with the light of a yellow sun, and possesses ^green;strange qualities^reset; that bestow strange properties to metals and plastics.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;碳^reset;在自然界有着极大的储量，但那并不意味着碳就没有用了。碳是^green;不可或缺的，可用于生产石墨烯^reset;。你会需要它们的。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Carbon^reset; is quite abundant, but that doesn't mean it has no use. Carbon is ^green;essential, and can produce things like Graphene^reset;. You want it.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;朱砂矿石^reset;其最有价值用途是从中提取^green;水银^reset;。纯度高达99%的朱砂矿石是极其稀有的品种。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Cinnabar^reset; is most useful for obtaining the ^green;mercury within^reset; it. This particular variety is extremely rare, with 99% or greater purity.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;腐化生物质^reset;存在于另一个维度而且与这个宇宙格格不入。^green;它的性质尚不明确^reset;，但已知的情况是它会腐化它所接触的一切生物。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Corruption^reset; exists in dimensional flux and is out of phase with this universe. ^green;Its exact nature is unknown^reset;, but it taints any life it touches here.

Texts.Chs: 通过熔炼或^green;提取^reset;你可以得到^orange;天青石^reset;中有用的资源。虽然并不是必需品，但收集一些会有用的。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Lazulite^reset; can be ^green;smelted or extracted^reset; to obtain the useful resources contained within. While not essential, it will be quite handy to have around.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;铅^reset;有着多种用途，但它^green;对于碳基生物来说是有害的^reset;，因此，处理它们时千万小心。告诉你含铅饮料很美味的朋友不是你真正的朋友。离他们远点。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Lead^reset; has a variety of uses but is also ^green;toxic to carbon-based life^reset; so be sure to handle it with care. If a friend says lead-juice is tasty, they are a liar. Avoid them.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;镁矿石^reset;相对来说，是一种常见的资源。但如果想要经营一间成功的生物实验室，你将会需要^green;大量^reset;的镁。镁可以用于^orange;熔炼或者提取^resett;。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Magnesium^reset; is a relatively common resource that you'll be needing ^green;quite a fair amount of^reset; to run a successful biology lab. It can be ^orange;smelted or extracted^reset;.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;月石矿^reset;是一种柔软的，可塑性好的金属，可用于^green;抵抗冲击与震荡^reset;。因此，将其用于稳定并安全保管通常情况下十分危险的物质是非常理想的。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Moonstone^reset; is a soft, moldable metal able to ^green;withstand concussive force^reset;. This makes it ideal for stabilizing otherwise dangerous materials in safety.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;半影矿石^reset;是一种极为不寻常的炽热的金属。可以在^green;半影星球^reset;及少数其他星球上找到。拥有它总是招人嫉妒的。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Penumbrite^reset; is a most unusual glowing metal. It is found ^green;naturally on Penumbra planets^reset; and few other locales. Acquire it and guard it jealously.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;晶体碎片^reset;是^orange;水晶与金属的混合物^reset;。能用于锻造^green;独一无二的装备^reset;。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Prism shards^reset; are a sort of ^orange;crystal/metal hybrid^reset; capable of being forged into a variety of handy equipment. You can work it into some ^green;unique and unusual gear^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 原体矿石是仅存在于^orange;原体世界^reset;的资源。它富含能源。能够用于硬化合金又或者是^green;将其液化并用于强化装备道具^reset;。售价很高。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Protocite is a resource unique to Proto Worlds^reset;. It is rich in energy, and capable of being hardened into an alloy or ^green;liquified for powering goods^reset;. Its value is high.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;寂灭矿石^reset;主要用于打磨，尤其是打磨^green;武器和盔甲^reset;方面。然而，因为其极强的毒性，在操作时请十分小心。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Quietus^reset; is useful for smooth, ^green;exceptionally sleek weapons and armor^reset;. Do not, however, get any in cuts due to potential toxins.
